mapper.select: select * from order_case where sts = 0 and uuid = #{uuid}
select asi.img_url from after_sale_images asi where asi.order_uuid = #{uuid} and asi.sts = 0 order by asi.created_time desc

select ocd.uuid,ocd.case_uuid,ocd.order_uuid,ocd.case_img_url, ocd.case_name,ocd.case_num,ocd.materials_expenses from order_case_detail ocd where ocd.order_uuid = #{uuid} and ocd.sts = 0 order by ocd.created_time desc
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM order_case WHERE sts = 0 AND car_owner_uuid = #{userUuid}

SELECT oc.uuid, oc.case_uuid, oc.car_owner_name, tc.title, oc.order_amount, oc.technician_name, oc.created_time FROM order_case oc LEFT JOIN technician_case tc ON oc.case_uuid = tc.uuid WHERE oc.sts = 0 AND oc.order_sts IN(1,6) AND oc.technician_uuid = #{technicianUuid} order by oc.created_time desc
SELECT COUNT(uuid) FROM order_case WHERE case_uuid = #{caseUuid} AND order_sts IN ( 1, 6 ) AND sts =0
